plot: Tommy prepares himself as the bloody battle lines are drawn between the Peaky Blinders and Changretta. A deal is struck - with potentially devastating consequences.

Having survived an attack by Changretta's gang Tommy learns that Lizzie is pregnant by him and that Polly set the gang up. As a result she and Michael leave Birmingham with the Golds. Changretta travels to London to arrange a deal with Alfie Solomons to enable his men to be present at the boxing match between Alfie's man Goliath and Bonnie but finds that Alfie strikes a hard bargain. Ada, questioned by the British army over her past as a Communist party member, is angry that Tommy has a business contract with them whilst Tommy goes on a charm offensive with Jessie Eden.—don @ minifie-1
